name: Arma 3 Apex
description:
Arma 3 Apex is an action, strategy and simulation game developed by Bohemia Interactive. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Bohemia Interactive. On review aggregator Metacritic, Arma 3 Apex has a score of 74. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Arma 3 Apex is available on PC.
